name: Colors of Motanka
description:
A small magical doll is set to save her old Pryvitna Street from becoming a parking lot.

Talk to your neighbors (human, inhuman, everything in-between), paint colorful mural, beat the evil develobots.

Controls:
Move - Arrows/AD
Jump - Space
Interact - E/X

Objective:
Paint all the murals

Team:
Emilia Majewska
Jerzy Gab
Piotr Spychała
Ola Sieradzka
Piotr Patelski
